dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1868 IS: Quarterly Financial Reporting Reauthorization Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Carper introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To extend by 15 years the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to conduct the quarterly financial report program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Quarterly Financial Reporting Reauthorization Act of 2015.

section.header: Fifteen-year extension of authority for Secretary of Commerce to conduct the quarterly financial report programs
section.text: Section 4(b) of the Act entitled An Act to amend title 13, United States Code, to transfer responsibility for the quarterly financial report from the Federal Trade Commission to the Secretary of Commerce, and for other purposes, approved January 12, 1983 (13 U.S.C. 91 note), is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2030.
